body:
## Steps to Reproduce

When I enabled `--preview-dart-2` option in Flutter plugin for Android Studio 3.0. I can omitted `new` and `const` keywords.

Today i upgraded to 3.1(Android Studio) and Flutter plugin 0.23.2. the option's be deleted. and I can't omitted that keywords. I upgraded flutter framework to newly.

## Version

`Flutter 0.2.5-pre.55 • channel master • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git Framework • revision 39eeec47d6 (11 hours ago) • 2018-03-27 15:27:24 -0700 Engine • revision 3e877d371a Tools • Dart 2.0.0-dev.40.0.flutter-06949dc985`

## Logs

```
`Performing full restart...
compiler message: lib/main.dart:71:16: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:         title: Text(widget.title),
compiler message:                ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:92:13: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:             Text(
compiler message:             ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:95:13: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:             Text(
compiler message:             ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:73:13: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:       body: Center(
compiler message:             ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:105:16: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:         child: Icon(Icons.add),
compiler message:                ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:102:29: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:       floatingActionButton: FloatingActionButton(
compiler message:                             ^
compiler message: lib/main.dart:67:12: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
compiler message:     return Scaffold(
compiler message:            ^
Restarted app in 2,984ms.
══╡ EXCEPTION CAUGHT BY WIDGETS LIBRARY ╞═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
The following _CompileTimeError was thrown building MyHomePage(dirty, state:
_MyHomePageState#6cd5b):
'file:///Users/kuochaoyi/AndroidStudioProjects/flutter_android_3_1/lib/main.dart': error: line 67
pos 12: lib/main.dart:67:12: Error: The keyword 'const' or 'new' is required here. Due to an
implementation limit, the compiler isn't able to infer 'const' or 'new' here.
return Scaffold(
^
return Scaffold(
^
```

comment_data.body: Yup, as @zoechi says, the runtime is not quite ready for this. Closing is favor of the other issue. Thanks for the feedback!

title: Can't omitted 'new' and 'const' word.
